Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2011 09:27PM puppygirl wrote: I''m so glad to have found this forum. I had a lumpectomy on July 28th, and I can't believe how painful the entire left breast still is. It hurts when I wear a bra, hurts when I take it off. I'm just about out of pain meds. The only relief is when I lie down next to a strategically-placed pillow. Or when I hold it gently - not something I really want to do around two teenage sons! Or sleep, yeah, that helps. Â I hope there is relief in sight soon.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy recovery ranrose ashleere
